refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: A call to defdrive returns a pointer to a string containing the name of the default system drive. The method used is to consult the Init module for the default directory name. The name is copied to a static data area and a pointer to it is returned.

refsect1.title: Diagnostics
refsect1.para: -1 is returned if the Init module cannot be linked to.
